summary.p: A very neat copy of the Caturakarāti by Beschi.
An off-print of Sicé (1841) is pasted in between the front cover and u1.
Description based on the examination of the original manuscript (November 2021).
Dimensions assessed at the time of examination.

extent.note: The leaves are broader in their middle than at their edges.

additions.desc: BnF shelfmark sticker: INDIEN 227 (front cover, verso).
BnF shelfmark in black pencil: Tamoul N° 227 (p1 = f[1]r).
Title added, in black pencil: Dictionnaire de la Langue scavante Malabare ou schem Tamoul i.e. centamiḻ (p3 = f[2]r).

binding.p: Leather (red) covers. Cypher, title, and shelfmark on the spine. Decoration on front cover, recto and back cover, verso. BnF shelfmark sticker (front cover, verso). Back cover, recto paginated 353.

origin.origDate: Internally dated to 1732, but it is not clear if this the date of composition of the work or the date of the copy. Not dated by Cabaton (1912). Entre 1732-1739 added in blue ink in Cabaton (1912).

acquisition.p: Probably sent by the Jesuits of the Mission du Carnate in the 1730s for the library of the king of France, although not mentioned in the available ancient lists (BnF NAF 5442, f5 and f9).

listBibl.bibl: Cabaton, Antoine. 1912. Catalogue sommaire des manuscrits indiens, indo-chinois et malayo-polynésiens. Bibliothèque nationale. Département des manuscrits. Paris: E. Leroux. — See p. 36, no. 227.
James, Gregory. 2000. Colporuḷ: A History of Tamil Dictionaries. 1st edition. Chennai: Cre-A. — See p. 109ff., 700.
S.n. 1739. Catalogus codicum manuscriptorum Bibliothecae regiae. Tomus primus. Pars prima, complectens codices manuscriptos orientales. Paris: Typographia Regia. — See no. CCLXXXIV, p. 448.
Sicé, E. (1841). Mémoire sur la vie, les ouvrages et les travaux apostoliques du Père Constant Beschi de la Compagnie de Jésus. Annales de Philosphie chrétienne 19, pp. 3-20.
Vinson, Julien & Feer, Léon & s.n. 1866-. Catalogue des manuscrits tamoul et télinga. Manuscript, BnF Indien 577. — See f. 54, no. 227.

Vinson, Julien. 1901. Notice sur quelques missionnaires jésuites qui ont écrit en tamoul et sur le tamoul au dernier siècle (suite). In: Revue de linguistique et de philologie comparée 33: 1-48. — See p. 16.

encodingDesc.p: General ― Unmarked length of ō and ē supplied. Unmarked puḷḷi supplied. Conjectural reading (text unclear) between parentheses. Supplied reading (text lost) between square brackets. Alternative readings separated by slash. In transliteration ― Unmarked elided overshort u supplied as an apostrophe. Uppercase for initial vowels. Symbols between curly brackets. Abbreviations ― c = column; f = folio; lf = library foliation; lm = left margin; r = recto; rm = right margin; u / U followed by a number = unit (codicological and/or textual); v = verso.
